ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.control

Class Mixer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.control.Mixer

  • public class Mixer
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates for multiple input values one combined output value. We use this functionality e.g. for driving the Throttle from the requested input speed (correction) and the requested pitch. We just calculate the weighted average of all the (scaled) inputs.
    Author:
    pschatzmann
